TLDR at top to save time,

TLDR: Fun but hard to recommend due to progresion system and no match making to find players your rank and get paired up with perked up killers instead, a lot of fun with a group of buds though.

Progression system is single handedly the worst thing I've experienced in my life 'specially since theres zero semblance of match making for ranks. I'm no stranger to grinding for progress but the way they handled it in this game is something else, instead of letting you choose perks and having all slots available to "build" a character you have this web of actual trash. They limit you to the amount of perks you can use by level. Once you reach level 25 you can use 4 slots which is fantastic but getting there is slow and painful considering you need to essentially buy trash upgrade items for picks ups. 

Theres also this "Cross Class" type deal where you get what might as well be 0 blood gems per game and you can spend your 0 gems on actual usefull things. (Note: I have yet to be able to purchase one of these 360/550 gems)

If there was some form of match making system all to pair you up with same leveled people these problems could posisbly be solved, because you could actually win games instead of getting destroyed by fully perked out tier 3 killers while all you have is tier 1 "you actually get nothing beneficial" perk. 

All that said it's fun but not very well polished but it's hilariously fun with a group of friends.
Horror?Dont think so;before you buy just make sure that you have some friends to play with or just fucking wait like me.
